context: In 2020, Zebra Technologies was a leader in automatic identification and data capture with approximately 40% market share in printers and barcodes, and 60% share of new Android mobile computers sold (50% overall mobile computer market share). The company acquired Reflexis Systems for $575M (workforce scheduling and task management software for retail, food service, hospitality, and banking). Experienced slight sales decline of -1% during the pandemic. Leading competitor Honeywell in low-double digits market share.

competitors.name: Honeywell International
competitors.notes: Next biggest competitor across all three markets (printers, barcodes, mobile computers); has low-double digit market share

competitors.name: Datalogic
competitors.notes: Significant competitor in automatic data capture and industrial automation

competitors.name: Sato Holdings
competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode printing and RFID technology
